first.name: Bob
first.text: Hi, you seems familiar. Did you went to the supermarket near the townhall a week ago?

first.name: Dovic
first.text: I'm afraid you're mistaken but a lot of people said it to me earlier

first.name: Bob
first.text: Ah okay, that's all right. Fight?

next.name: Bob
next.text: Yeah, and I'm bringing hand sanitizer this time
